module.name: extended_geometric_tolerance
module.keywords: module, datum extension, datum, geometric tolerance, dimensioning tolerance

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module the representation of geometric and dimensional tolerance data and associated properties. The geometrical tolerancing representation is in accordance with pre-existing standards such as ISO 1101. The extensions provide additional details and specialization to those capabilities in ISO 10303-1051.

inscope.li: generalization of datum for purposes other than specifying shape tolerance requirements;Serve as input to a tolerance analysis process or to a rule based model quality analysis system.
description of datum differences for mapping from geometric models to lexical models;Capturing design intent in an explicit form;
items within the scope of application module Default tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1052;
items within the scope of application module Geometric tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1051;
items within the scope of application module Non feature shape element, ISO/TS 10303-1706;
items within the scope of application module Requirement decomposition, ISO/TS 10303-1740.

outscope.li: the interpretation of the specifications of particular geometric tolerances.
